TitleEnglish: See You Tomorrow at the Food Court
SummaryEnglish: Meet Wada, who gives off an unapproachable vibe, and Yamamoto, who strikes fear into those around her because of her looks. Though the two girls attend separate high schools, they meet up at a shopping center’s food court almost every day. Take a little peek at the laid-back afternoons Wada and Yamamoto share as they reflect on the ups and downs of high school life together.
Aliases: フードコートで女子高生が喋るだけ
Food Court de Joshikousei ga Shaberu dake
Fūdo Kōto de Joshikousei ga Shaberu dake
Fuudo Kooto de Joshikousei ga Shaberu dake
See You at the Food Court Tomorrow

1.TitleEnglish: WADA1234 / Nazca Lines Aliens / Psibola / Change Before You Have To
1.SummaryEnglish: Wada and Yamamoto meet up and discuss social media, dreams, over-the-counter drugs, and handy English phrases.

2.TitleEnglish: Rigged Crane Game / Single-Ply Double Roll / Dream Theater / A Doggy Purpose
2.SummaryEnglish: Wada and Yamamoto tackle claw machines, toilet paper, reader-insert fanfiction, and a bowl of spicy udon.

3.SummaryEnglish: Wada and Yamamoto contemplate kanji readings, fandom culture, raising pets, and asking personal questions.

4.TitleEnglish: Caramel Ribbon / We Live in Opposite Directions / It Doesn't Stink / Generic Wada
4.SummaryEnglish: Wada and Yamamoto talk about going to the dentist, stranger danger, new hairstyles, and look-alikes.

5.SummaryEnglish: Wada and Yamamoto contemplate permanent markers, how relationships change people, and summer getaway plans.

6.TitleEnglish: Randy / Gorilla Tape / Toxic Fan / See You Tomorrow at the Food Court
6.SummaryEnglish: Wada and Yamamoto ponder shifting loyalties, digital surveillance, content monetization, and fad diets.
